info.title: EchoNest
info.description: Gain access to billions of data points about music, including artist info, taste profiles, playlists and more.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: The desired licenses of the returned images.

get.description: Get a list of artist biographies.

parameters.name: callback

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

parameters.name: high_relevance
parameters.description: If true only items that are highly relevant for this artist will be returned.

get.description: Get a list of news articles found on the web related to an artist.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description:
Indicates what data should be returned with each artist. Bucket:
biographies: returns up to the 15 most recent biographies found on the web related to the artist
blogs: returns up to the 15 most recent blogs found on the web related to the artist
doc_counts(beta): returns document counts for each of the various artist document types
familiarity: returns the familiarity for the artist
hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss for the artist
images: returns up to the 15 most recent images found on the web related to the artist
news: returns up to the 15 most recent news articles found on the web related to the artist
reviews: returns up to the 15 most recent reviews found on the web related to the artist
songs(beta): returns up to the 15 hotttest songs for the artist
urls: returns links to this artist's pages on various sites
video: returns up to the 15 most recent videos found on the web related to the artist
years_active(beta): returns years active information for the artist
id:rosetta-catalog: returns catalog specific information about the artist for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.
id:Taste-Profile-ID: returns personal catalog specific information about the artist for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.

get.description: Get basic information on an artist: the name, the Echo Nest ID, and the MusicBrainz ID.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

get.description: Get reviews related to an artist's work.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description:
Indicates what data should be returned with each artist. Bucket:
biographies: returns up to the 15 most recent biographies found on the web related to the artist
blogs: returns up to the 15 most recent blogs found on the web related to the artist
doc_counts(beta): returns document counts for each of the various artist document types
familiarity: returns the familiarity for the artist
hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss for the artist
images: returns up to the 15 most recent images found on the web related to the artist
news: returns up to the 15 most recent news articles found on the web related to the artist
reviews: returns up to the 15 most recent reviews found on the web related to the artist
songs(beta): returns up to the 15 hotttest songs for the artist
urls: returns links to this artist's pages on various sites
video: returns up to the 15 most recent videos found on the web related to the artist
years_active(beta): returns years active information for the artist
id:rosetta-catalog: returns catalog specific information about the artist for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.
id:Taste-Profile-ID: returns personal catalog specific information about the artist for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given idspaces or catalogs.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: A musical style or genre like rock, jazz, or funky. See the method list_terms for details on what styles are currently available.

parameters.name: mood
parameters.description: A mood like happy or sad. See the method list_terms for details on what moods are currently available.

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: For search by description, style or mood indicates whether results should be ranked by query relevance or by artist familiarity

parameters.name: fuzzy_match
parameters.description: If true, a fuzzy search is performed.

parameters.name: max_familiarity
parameters.description: The maximum familiarity for returned artists (0.0 < familiarity < 1.0). Default: 1.0

parameters.name: min_familiarity
parameters.description: The minimum familiarity for returned artists (0.0 < familiarity < 1.0). Default: 0.0

parameters.name: max_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The maximum hotttnesss for returned artists (0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0). Default: 1.0

parameters.name: min_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The minimum hotttnesss for returned artists (0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0). Default: 0.0

parameters.name: artist_start_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_start_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specified the sort order of the results.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the results.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the song.

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: The name of the primary artist.

parameters.name: combined
parameters.description: Query both artist and title fields.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the artist.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: A musical style or genre like rock, jazz, or funky.

parameters.name: mood
parameters.description: A mood like happy or sad.

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: For search by description, style or mood indicates whether results should be ranked by query relevance or by artist familiarity

parameters.name: artist_id
parameters.description: The artist ID. An Echo Nest ID or a Rosetta ID (See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta).

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

parameters.name: max_tempo
parameters.description: The maximum tempo for the song. 0.0 < tempo < 500.0 (BPM)

parameters.name: min_tempo
parameters.description: The minimun tempo for the song. 0.0 < tempo < 500.0 (BPM)

parameters.name: max_duration
parameters.description: The maximum duration of any song. 0.0 < duration < 3600.0 (seconds)

parameters.name: min_duration
parameters.description: The minimun duration of any song. 0.0 < duration < 3600.0 (seconds)

parameters.name: max_loudness
parameters.description: The maximum loudness of any song. -100.0 < loudness < 100.0 (dB)

parameters.name: min_loudness
parameters.description: The minimum loudness of any song. -100.0 < loudness < 100.0 (dB)

parameters.name: artist_max_familiarity
parameters.description: The maximum familiarity of any song. 0.0 < familiarity < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_min_familiarity
parameters.description: The minimum familiarity of any song. 0.0 < familiarity < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_start_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_start_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: song_max_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The maximum hotttnesss of any song. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: song_min_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The minimum hotttnesss of any song. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_max_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The maximum hotttnesss of any song's artist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_min_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The minimum hotttnesss of any song's artist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: max_longitude
parameters.description: The maximum longitude of the primary artist location. -180.0 < longitude < 180.0

parameters.name: min_longitude
parameters.description: The minimum longitude of the primary artist location. -180.0 < longitude < 180.0

parameters.name: max_latitude
parameters.description: The maximum latitude of the primary artist location. -90.0 < latitude < 90.0

parameters.name: min_latitude
parameters.description: The minimum latitude of the primary artist location. -90.0 < latitude < 90.0

parameters.name: max_danceability
parameters.description: The maximum danceability of any song. 0.0 < danceability < 1.0

parameters.name: min_danceability
parameters.description: The minimum danceability of any song. 0.0 < danceability < 1.0

parameters.name: max_energy
parameters.description: The maximum energy of any song. 0.0 < energy < 1.0

parameters.name: min_energy
parameters.description: The minimum energy of any song. 0.0 < energy < 1.0

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode of songs. (minor, major) 0, 1

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of songs in the playlist. (c, c-sharp, d, e-flat, e, f, f-sharp, g, a-flat, a, b-flat, b) 0 - 11

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description:
Indicates what data should be returned for each song. If specifying the "tracks" bucket, a bucket with an id space must also be specified. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details on retrieving information associated with a particular catalog. Bucket:
audio_summary: returns summary audio parameters for the song
artist_familiarity: returns the familiarity for the song's artist
artist_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss for the song's artist
artist_location: returns information about the location of origin for the song's artist
song_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss of the song
tracks: returns detailed track information for the song. You must also specify a Rosetta id space such as 7digital-US.
id:rosetta-catalog: returns catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.
id:Personal-Catalog-ID: returns personal catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Indicates how the songs results should be ordered.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given idspaces or catalogs.

get.description: Search for songs given different query types.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the results.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description:
Indicates what data should be returned for each song. If specifying the "tracks" bucket, a bucket with an id space must also be specified. Bucket:
audio_summary: returns summary audio parameters for the song
artist_familiarity: returns the familiarity for the song's artist
artist_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss for the song's artist
artist_location: returns information about the location of origin for the song's artist
song_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss of the song
tracks: returns detailed track information for the song. You must also specify a Rosetta id space such as 7digital-US.
id:rosetta-catalog: returns catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.
id:Personal-Catalog-ID: returns personal catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given idspaces or catalogs.

get.description: Get info about songs given a list of ids.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of codegen used to generate the code. Currently supported versions are 3.15 for ENMFP and 4.11 for Echoprint. If not specified, version 3.15 is used. See the section below on Echo Nest Fingerprinting systems to determine which fingerprinting system is best for you.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description:
Specifies which information should be returned for each matching song. Bucket:
audio_summary: returns summary audio parameters for the song
artist_familiarity: returns the familiarity for the song's artist
artist_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss for the song's artist
artist_location: returns information about the location of origin for the song's artist
song_hotttnesss: returns the hotttnesss of the song
tracks: returns detailed track information for the song. You must also specify a Rosetta id space such as 7digital-US.
id:rosetta-catalog: returns catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.
id:Personal-Catalog-ID: returns personal catalog specific information about the song for the given catalog. See http://developer.echonest.com/docs/v4/index.html#rosetta for details.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The FP hashcodes for the track.

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: The name of the artist from the ID3 tag.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the track from the ID3 tag.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the track from the ID3 tag.

parameters.name: release
parameters.description: The title of the album/release from the ID3 tag.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The length of time of the track, in seconds.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: The genre from the ID3 tag.

post.description: Identifies a song given an Echoprint or Echo Nest Musical Fingerprint hash codes. Request with Content-Type "multipart/form-data" where all parameters are in the post body and the query is in the "query" parameter of the post "files".

parameters.description: Indicates which track data should be returned (only valid if wait is true).

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Specifies which rosetta id space info should be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given rosetta id space.

parameters.name: dmca
parameters.description: If true the playlist delivered will meet the DMCA rules.

get.description: Returns a basic playlist.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the playlist to be generated.

parameters.name: artist_pick
parameters.description: The artist_pick parameter is used to determine how songs are picked for each artist in artist-type playlists. If the asc or desc suffix is ommitted, artist_pick defaults to descending.

parameters.name: variety
parameters.description: The maximum variety of artists to be represented in the playlist. A higher number will allow for more variety in the artists. 0 - 1 (default = 0.3)

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.description: Controls the distribution of artists in the playlist. A focused distribution yields a playlist of songs that are tightly clustered around the seeds, whereas a wandering distribution yields a playlist from a broader range of artists.

parameters.name: adventurousness
parameters.description: Controls the trade between known music and unknown music. A value of 0 means no adventurousness, only known and preferred music will be played. A value of 1 means high adventurousness, mostly unknown music will be played. A value of auto indicates that the adventurousness should be automatically determined based upon the taste profile of the user. This parameter only applies to catalog and catalog-radio type playlists.0 - 1 (default = 0.2)

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The desired number of songs in the playlist. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: max_tempo
parameters.description: The maximum tempo for any included songs. 0.0 < tempo < 500.0 (BPM)

parameters.name: min_tempo
parameters.description: The minimun tempo for any included songs. 0.0 < tempo < 500.0 (BPM)

parameters.name: max_duration
parameters.description: The maximum duration of any song on the playlist. 0.0 < duration < 3600.0 (seconds)

parameters.name: min_duration
parameters.description: The minimun duration of any song on the playlist. 0.0 < duration < 3600.0 (seconds)

parameters.name: max_loudness
parameters.description: The maximum loudness of any song on the playlist. -100.0 < loudness < 100.0 (dB)

parameters.name: min_loudness
parameters.description: The minimum loudness of any song on the playlist. -100.0 < loudness < 100.0 (dB)

parameters.name: max_danceability
parameters.description: The maximum danceability of any song. 0.0 < danceability < 1.0

parameters.name: min_danceability
parameters.description: The minimum danceability of any song. 0.0 < danceability < 1.0

parameters.name: max_energy
parameters.description: The maximum energy of any song. 0.0 < energy < 1.0

parameters.name: min_energy
parameters.description: The minimum energy of any song. 0.0 < energy < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_max_familiarity
parameters.description: The maximum artist familiarity for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < familiarity < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_min_familiarity
parameters.description: The minimum artist familiarity for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < familiarity < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_max_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The maximum artist hotttness for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_min_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The minimum artist hotttness for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_start_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_start_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have an earliest start year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_before
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year before the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: artist_end_year_after
parameters.description: Matches artists that have a latest end year after the given value. Examples: 1970, 2011, present

parameters.name: song_max_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The maximum hotttnesss for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: song_min_hotttnesss
parameters.description: The minimum hotttnesss for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: max_longitude
parameters.description: The maximum longitude for the location of artists in the playlist. -180.0 < longitude < 180.0

parameters.name: min_longitude
parameters.description: The minimum longitude for the location of artists in the playlist. -180.0 < longitude < 180.0

parameters.name: max_latitude
parameters.description: The maximum latitude for the location of artists in the playlist. -90.0 < latitude < 90.0

parameters.name: min_latitude
parameters.description: The minimum latitude for the location of artists in the playlist. -90.0 < latitude < 90.0

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode of songs in the playlist. (minor, major) 0, 1

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of songs in the playlist. (c, c-sharp, d, e-flat, e, f, f-sharp, g, a-flat, a, b-flat, b) 0 - 11

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Indicates what data should be returned in the playlist (for json and xml types only).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Indicates how the songs should be ordered in the playlist.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given idspaces or catalogs.

parameters.name: dmca
parameters.description: If true the playlist delivered will meet the DMCA rules.

parameters.name: adventurousness
parameters.description: Controls the trade between known music and unknown music. A value of 0 means no adventurousness, only known and preferred music will be played. A value of 1 means high adventurousness, mostly unknown music will be played. A value of auto indicates that the adventurousness should be automatically determined based upon the taste profile of the user. This parameter only applies to catalog and catalog-radio type playlists.0 - 1 (default = 0.2)

parameters.description: The maximum artist familiarity for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < familiarity < 1.0

parameters.name: artist_start_year_before

parameters.description: The maximum hotttnesss for songs in the playlist. 0.0 < hotttnesss < 1.0

parameters.name: song_min_hotttnesss

parameters.name: min_latitude
parameters.description: The minimum latitude for the location of artists in the playlist. -90.0 < latitude < 90.0

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode of songs in the playlist. (minor, major) 0, 1

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of songs in the playlist. (c, c-sharp, d, e-flat, e, f, f-sharp, g, a-flat, a, b-flat, b) 0 - 11

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Indicates what data should be returned in the playlist (for json and xml types only).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Indicates how the songs should be ordered in the playlist.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If 'true', limit the results to any of the given idspaces or catalogs.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The id of the current playlist session. To start a new session, call playlist/dynamic with no session ID.

parameters.name: dmca
parameters.description: If true the playlist delivered will meet the DMCA rules.

parameters.name: adventurousness
parameters.description: Controls the trade between known music and unknown music. A value of 0 means no adventurousness, only known and preferred music will be played. A value of 1 means high adventurousness, mostly unknown music will be played. A value of auto indicates that the adventurousness should be automatically determined based upon the taste profile of the user. This parameter only applies to catalog and catalog-radio type playlists. Setting this parameter on a prexisting session resets the playlist session. 0 - 1 (default = 0.2)

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: The user rating for the previous track. 5 is the highest rating, 1 is the lowest rating. Some playlist algorithms will adapt playlists based upon these ratings.

parameters.name: chain_xspf
parameters.description: If true, an additional 'track' is added to the end XSPF playlist that is a URL to the next XSPF in the chain.

parameters.name: steer
parameters.description: Using the previously played track as the basis, make all future tracks some multiplier of the selected attribute(s). required terms use a multiplier in a boost-like format - e.g. energy^.5 to make all future songs have half the energy of the previously played song, or loudness^1.3 to add 30%.

parameters.name: steer_description
parameters.description: Using the current playlist as a basis, add or remove terms relating to the artists and songs to be played. Applying a term again will overwrite the previous term, including boost. Boosting with a "0" will remove a term from the list of qualifiers. Using 'description' rather than 'steer_description' will clear the description list and restart the playlist session with the new term.

parameters.name: steer_style
parameters.description: Using the current playlist as a basis, add or remove terms relating to the style of artists and songs to be played. Applying a style again will overwrite the previous style, including boost. Boosting with a "0" will remove a term from the list of qualifiers. Using 'style' rather than 'steer_style' will clear the style list and restart the playlist session with the new style.

parameters.name: steer_mood
parameters.description: Using the current playlist as a basis, add or remove terms relating to the mood of artists and songs to be played. Applying a mood again will overwrite the previous mood, including boost. Boosting with a "0" will remove a mood from the list of moods. Using 'mood' rather than 'steer_mood' will clear the mood list and restart the playlist session with the new mood.

parameters.name: ban
parameters.description: Banning will prevent the song/all songs by that artist from appearing again in the current playlist session.

get.description: To get the next song in the playlist.

parameters.description: The id of the current playlist session. To start a new session, call playlist/dynamic with no session ID.

For artist items: biographies, blogs, doc_counts, familiarity, hotttnesss, images, news, reviews, songs, terms, urls, video, years_active, id:Rosetta-space

parameters.name: sandbox

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the asset.

parameters.name: oauth_nonce
parameters.description: A random string of characters that differs from call to call and is never repeated in a 10 minute window.

parameters.name: oauth_timestamp
parameters.description: The number of seconds elapsed since midnight, 1 January 1970. Be sure this is within ten minutes of the real time. You can get the current timestamp that the Echo Nest API is using by via the oauth/timestamp method.

parameters.name: oauth_signature_method
parameters.description: Algorithm used to generate the signature. Supported methods are HMAC-SHA1.

parameters.name: oauth_consumer_key
parameters.description: The consumer key used to sign calls.

parameters.name: oauth_signature
parameters.description: The cryptographic signature for the method call. Calls are signed using your consumer key, your shared secret, the HTTP method and an encoded version of the base string of the URL.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: The number of results desired. 0 < results < 100

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The desired index of the first result returned.

get.description: Gets access to the listed assets.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function for JSONP requests. Required if format is jsonp.

get.description: Returns the current time of The Echo Nest API server. This time can be used to synchronize the local time with The Echo Nest allowing you to set a proper timestamp used generate authenticated requests to the API.

info.title: EchoNest
info.description: Gain access to billions of data points about music, including artist info, taste profiles, playlists and more.
